label: ProductionDevice
comment: An object, especially a piece of mechanical or electronic equipment, made or adapted in order to perform a production activity.

datatypeProperties.comment: A parameter applicable to this specified method.
A production machine combined with this production machine.
A production device combined with this production machine.
A textual description of a function for this trade product.
An input batch applicable to this production machine.
Input material applicable to this facility production unit.
An input product applicable to this facility production unit.
A measure of the input capacity for this production facility.
An output batch applicable to this specified production device.
Output material applicable to this facility production unit.
An output product applicable to this facility production unit.
A measure of the output capacity for this production facility.
A type, expressed as text, for this specified production device.
An IOT (Internet of Things) device or scanning device reporting event for this production machine.
A requested operational parameter applicable to this production machine.
A referenced location specified for this material.
A facility production unit for this specified production device.
The code specifying the subordinate type for this production device.

referencedBy.comment: A production device allocated to this production process.
A production device applicable to this product colour.
A production device combined with this production machine.
